mapper.insert: insert into host (h_email, h_passwd, h_name, h_phone, h_business, h_level, h_profile, h_file) values (#{userId}, #{pwd}, #{h_name}, #{h_phone}, #{h_business}, 9, #{h_profile}, #{h_file})
mapper.select: select h_passwd from host where h_email=#{userId}
select count(h_idx) from host where h_email=#{userId}
select h_email from host where h_name=#{h_name} and h_phone=#{h_phone} and h_business=#{h_business}
select count(h_idx) from host where h_email=#{userId} and h_phone=#{h_phone} and h_business=#{h_business}
